meta.job_title: Travel Registered Nurse - Long Term Acute Care

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide long-term acute care nursing services to patients in a travel nursing setting.
Adhere to discipline-specific protocols and best practices for delivering quality patient care.
Work 12-hour night shifts for 36 hours per week, ensuring continuity of care for patients.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary teams to support patients' medical needs and promote positive outcomes.
Maintain accurate patient records and documentation in compliance with healthcare regulations.
Participate in ongoing education and training to stay updated on the latest nursing practices and treatments.
